Title: ‚Ü©Ô∏èüé¨ In St. Petersburg, the head of the municipal district threw ...
Description: ASTRA: In St. Petersburg, observers found safes for ballots with removable back walls at two (No. 566 and 561) polling stations in the Kalininsky district of the city In St. Petersburg, the head of the municipal district threw boiling water in the face of a member of the election commissionAbout this, the victim is a member of TEC No. 62 with the right of casting vote Alexander Klyukov himself told OVD-Info. Klyukov was attacked by the head of the Georgievsky municipal district, Vitaly Zholdasov - the moment of the attack was caught on video.As a result, Klyukov was hospitalized.At another site in St. Petersburg, unknown men with citizenship (one of them - wearing a T-shirt with a swastika) they strangled and forcibly pushed the observer out of the station, after which they handed him over to the police. The security forces drew up a report on the observer, and not on his offenders. And in the Kalininsky district of the city, observers discovered safes for ballots with removable back walls.In the gubernatorial elections of St. Petersburg this year, the former head of security at Putin‚Äôs residence, Alexander Beglov, won with more than 59% of the votes.

Title: A corn farmer crashed in the Moscow region, the crew died, TG cha...
Description: A corn farmer crashed in the Moscow region, the crew died, TG channel 112 claims, citing a sourceIt is reported that the crashed An-12 plane was undergoing a test flight and crashed in the area airfield near the village of Vatulino west of Moscow. Previously, there were two pilots on board the plane.

Title: üñº In the elections, 308 (out of 380) participants in the war nom...
Description: In the elections, 308 (out of 380) war participants nominated by United Russia received mandates This was announced by the acting secretary of the United Russia General Council, Vladimir Yakushev. They received mandates in elections at various levels. Yakushev also reported that 31 mandates were received by candidates from among the activists of the Young Guard of United Russia.In addition, candidates from United Russia, those promoted to senior management positions in Russian regionsreceived 25 of the 25 mandates they applied for, Yakushev said.

Title: The former leader of an organized crime group, pardoned by Putin,...
Description: The former leader of an organized crime group, pardoned by Putin, was sentenced to eight years of strict regime for the murder of a passerbyAndrei Ashcheulov (known by his nickname -Ashcheul-) received 8 years for the murder of a resident of the Krasnoyarsk village of Bolshaya Irba , committed by him in May of this year. The verdict was reported by the press service of the Abakan Garrison Military Court.A drunken Asheulov shot a passerby with a gun for remarking about parking his car. He shot 50-year-old Anatoly Khokhlov in the head, causing the father of 4 children to die on the spot. In the past, Ashcheulov was the leader of the Kuraginskaya organized crime group. In 2019, he was sentenced to 18 years of maximum security for theft, robbery, robbery and extortion. In the colony, he signed a contract with Wagner PMC, after which he received a pardon from Putin.TelegramASTRA-Blown off half of Tolik‚Äôs head.- In Krasnoyarsk, the pardoned leader of an organized crime group was detained on suspicion of a new murder.The leader of the Kuraginskaya organized crime group, Andrei Ashcheulov, known by his nickname -Ashcheul,- was detained on suspicion of murder of a resident of the village of Bolshaya Irba.According to a relative...

Title: ‚Ü©Ô∏è In St. Petersburg, observers found safes for ballots with remo...
Description: ASTRA: In St. Petersburg, men in civilian clothes forcibly took an observer from the site. A report on hooliganism was drawn up against him and he was left overnight in the department. Observer Dmitry Popov was detained on the territory of PEC 2213, writes OVD-Info. Popov was detained on... Observers in St. Petersburg discovered ballot safes with removable back walls on two (No. 566 and 561) plots in the Kalininsky district of the city

Title: üñº In Nikopol (Dnepropetrovsk region), a 16-year-old girl died as...
Description: In Nikopol (Dnepropetrovsk region), a 16-year-old girl was killed as a result of Russian shelling, local authorities reported. Her body was pulled out from under the rubble of a private house. Three more people were injured as a result of the shelling - a 79-year-old man was taken to the hospital in moderate condition, two refused hospitalization.

Title: üñº In Sweden, drones were spotted on the territory of the country...
Description: In Sweden, drones were spotted on the territory of the country's largest international airport. An investigation is underway into a possible sabotage attempt Due to the appearance of unidentified UAVs, flights at Stockholm Arlanda Airport were stopped for two hours - from 23:00 to 1:30. An investigation into possible sabotage has been launched, the country's police said. In total, at least four dronesof different sizes. In March, unknown flying objects were spotted in the south of the country - in the area of ‚Äã‚Äãa nuclear power plant. At the time, police also said they had opened an investigation. When asked by journalists about the -possible involvement of foreign forces,- the police then said that it was premature to draw any conclusions about this.

Description: As an advertisement. üåç Not to fight is your constitutional right. The -Call to Conscience- will help defend it. Find out how to apply for the AGS and avoid the draft.üì≤ Time to act! Subscribe to channel with useful information, check out instructions and if something is not clear, write to bot, and lawyers will help you.TelegramCall to conscienceConscious refusal of military service and the fight against arbitrariness* Hotline: @agsnowarbot * Instructions: instructions.peaceplea.org* Generator claims: @ne_poedu_bot* Support us: peaceplea.org

Title: üñº Russia has exhausted Soviet energy reserves, the Minister of E...
Description: Russia has exhausted Soviet energy reserves, the Energy Minister saidRussian energy does not have enough funding, Energy Minister Sergei Tsivilev said in an interview with TASS. -The example of the UES of the East once again shows that the reserves of the energy sector created in the USSR have been exhausted. The main reason is underfunding for the modernization of equipment and maintaining it in standard condition,- Tsivilev told TASS at the Eastern Economic Forum (EEF).Tsivilev is the former governor of the Kemerovo region. He is married to Putin's cousin Anna Tsivileva (Putin recently appointed her Deputy Minister of Defense). The day before, speaking at the WEF, Putin also spoke about the lack of energy in the Far East. Because of this, Putin said, the construction of infrastructure and industrial projects is being delayed. In the summer, against the background of the shutdown of the power unit of the Rostov Nuclear Power Plant, which left two and a half million people without electricity, Putin said that Cryptocurrency miners pose a threat to Russia's energy security. After this, the State Duma approved the law on mining, which, among other things, gives regional authorities the opportunity to introduce a territorial ban on cryptocurrency mining.

Title: In St. Petersburg, men in civilian clothes forcibly took away the observers...
Description: In St. Petersburg, men in civilian clothes forcibly took away an observer from the polling station. They drew up a report on hooliganism and left him overnight in the departmentThe observer Dmitry Popov was detained in the territory of PEC 2213, writes -OVD-Info-. Popov's detention was caught on video - it shows him being forcibly taken out of the polling station by several men in civilian clothes. They did not introduce themselves, so it is not known what kind of people they are. It is possible that they are employees of the Ministry of Internal Affairs in civilian clothes. It is noteworthy that one of them is wearing a T-shirt with a swastika print. It is unknown what caused the conflict. At the police station Popov wrote a statement in which he said that three unknown persons in civilian clothes used violence against him and strangled him heavily when they were taking him out of the polling station. They drew up a report on petty hooliganism (part 1 of Article 20.1 of the Administrative Code) and left him in the police station overnight. Video is too big

Title: ‚Ü©Ô∏è -United Russia - won all parliamentary elections in the region...
Description: ASTRA: -Yedinaya Rossiya- has won the Khabarovsk Krai gubernatorial election for the first time since 2013 The gubernatorial election in Khabarovsk Krai was won by United Russia's proxy Dmitry Demeshin (pictured) with over 80% of the vote. The last time a United Russia candidate won... -United Russia has won all parliamentary elections in the regionsIn all 10 regions where parliamentary elections were held last weekend, the United Russia won. These are the republics of Altai, Mari El, Tatarstan, Tuva, Kabardino-Balkaria, Karachay-Cherkessia, Khabarovsk Krai, as well as the Bryansk, Tula and Volgograd oblasts, according to the -7x7- edition. The ruling party showed the highest result in Tyva - 80.80%. The lowest result for United Russia was in Khabarovsk Krai, where, according to the latest data, the party got 45.93% of the vote. In recent years, the LDPR has held a majority in the region's parliament. United Russia also won gubernatorial elections in 20 regions, where incumbent governors and deputy governors won. The ruling party even won the election of the head of Khabarovsk Krai, which has not happened since 2013.

Title: ‚Ü©Ô∏èüñº -United Russia - won the presidential elections for the first time since 2013...
Description: ASTRA: Elections in Russia: the results of three days of voting During the three days from September 6 to 8, Russia held elections for the heads of 21 regions. Among them the governor of St. Petersburg was also elected. In addition, in Moscow elected deputies of the Moscow City Duma, and in other regions... -United Russia- for the first time since 2013 won the election of the head of the Khabarovsk region In the election of the governor of the Khabarovsk region won Dmitry Demeshin (pictured) from -United Russia- - he won more than 80% of the votes. The last time a candidate from United Russia won the Khabarovsk Territory 9 years ago, when Vyacheslav Shprot became the head of the region. Then the elections were won by LDPR candidates: the disgraced Sergei Furgal and his successor Mikhail Degtyaryov. Demeshin was appointed head of the region by Putin's decree in the spring of this year. Together with Demeshin, all incumbent regional heads won the election. In 20 regions of Russia, the incumbent heads are officials from United Russia - all of them retained their posts. For example, Alexei Smirnov, the acting governor of Kursk Region, won 65.28% of the vote. In one more region - Zabaikalskaya Krai - Governor Osipov, who has the status of a self-nominated candidate, retained his post.

Title: üñº The former Tomsk deputy governor received 5 years in prison for embezzlement...
Description: A court in Tomsk has found former deputy governor for investments (and former senator from the region) Yury Gurdin guilty of organizing a particularly large embezzlement (Article 33 and part 4 of Article 160 of the Criminal Code of the Russian Federation), TASS reported. Gurdin was sentenced to 5 years in a general regime colony - although the prosecutor's office requested 8 years - as well as a fine of 400,000 rubles.Gurdin was arrested in July 2022. According to the investigation, Gurdin is involved in the embezzlement of 79 million rubles allocated for the creation of a student campus in Tomsk. In 2020, Gurdin allegedly persuaded the director of the regional Investment Activity Development Fund to pay for the construction of the campus at an inflated price. Gurdin himself did not admit guilt. His defense claims that the former official could not influence the budget and financing of the campus project.

Title: üñº In Syria, five people were killed as a result of Israeli shelling...
Description: In Syria, five people have been killed by Israeli air force shelling The shelling hit the outskirts of the town of Masyaf in central Syria. At least five people have been killed and 19 others injured - some of whom are in critical condition, state news agency Sana reported. All the victims of the attack are said to be civilians. Israeli fighter jets attacked Syrian territory from Lebanese airspace, Sana writes. -Al Jazeera notes that the Israeli air force probably wanted to avoid entering Syrian airspace itself - where Russian and U.S. planes fly, among others.

Title: Russian air defenses shot down two drones overnight - one each over Bel...
Description: Russian air defense forces shot down two drones overnight - one each over Belgorod and Kursk regions, the Defense Ministry said. In Ukraine overnight, Russian-Iranian drones - shahid drones - attacked the Kiev region in several waves - according to local authorities, all of them were shot down on the approach to the capital. Preliminarily, there is no destruction or casualties. Two Russian air bombs fell in Kharkiv overnight, the authorities reported - a garage and four private houses were damaged, no one was injured. A missile alert has now been declared in Kharkiv Region for at least the eighth time overnight.

Title: üé¨üñº Orthodox oligarch Malofeev married the commissioner for...
Description: Orthodox oligarch Malofeev married child rights ombudsman Lvova-BelovaKonstantin Malofeev is called one of the main sponsors of the war with Ukraine - the owner of the Orthodox TV channel Tsargrad started financing the Donbass separatists in 2014. Last weekend Malofeev married Maria Lvova-Belova, a children's rights ombudsman, according to Baza and Werstka. Since 2022 Lvova-Belova has been engaged in the export of Ukrainian orphans to Russia - for this the International Criminal Court issued an arrest warrant for the official (in the same case the ICC issued an arrest warrant for Vladimir Putin). Malofeev and Lvova-Belova have 12 children from their previous marriages (Lvova-Belova has 5 native and 5 adopted children). Malofeev's divorce from his ex-wife became known in 2023. Lvova-Belova has not officially announced her divorce from her husband, priest Pavel Kogelmanov. For the first time talk about the affair of the Commissioner for Children's Rights and the Orthodox oligarch began to go in the winter of 2024 - they were seen holding hands during the Tsar's procession in Yekaterinburg. Malofeev and Lvova-Belova celebrated their wedding in a restaurant in the luxurious Deauville village near Moscow. Dima Bilan, Grigory Leps, Valeria and Leonid Agutin performed for the guests. The latter's performance came as a surprise to many commentators - it was believed that the singer had an anti-war stance. In 2022, Agutin several times called to stop the war with Ukraine, because of which the artist even canceled concerts in Russia.

Title: üñº Elections in Russia: results of three days of voting Within three...
Description: Elections in Russia: the results of the three-day voting During the three days from September 6 to 8, Russia held elections for the heads of 21 regions. Among them, the governor of St. Petersburg was also elected. In addition, deputies of the Moscow City Duma were elected in Moscow, and in other regions - deputies of regional parliaments.In most regions, where preliminary voting results are already known, the incumbent governors won, and the United Russia party won the majority of votes. The exception was Bratsk in the Irkutsk Region, where self-nominated candidate Alexander Dubrovin won. According to preliminary voting results, Igor Babushkin (Astrakhan Oblast), Alexander Osipov (Transbaikalia), Andrei Besprozvannykh (Kaliningrad Oblast), Vadim Shumkov (Kurgan Oblast), Vyacheslav Fedorishchev (Samara Oblast), Valery Limarenko (Sakhalin Oblast), Vladimir Vladimirov (Stavropol Krai), Dmitry Demeshin (Khabarovsk Krai) got more than 80 percent of the votes. Chelyabinsk Region Governor Alexei Teksler, according to preliminary results, won almost 96 percent of the vote. There, children were made to stand with posters of Clean Victory and Fair Elections. Preliminarily, 38 Moscow City Duma deputies will represent United Russia, with the other seven representing other parties and self-nominated candidates.The Moscow City Election Commission said voter turnout was about 40 percent. Three million Muscovites voted electronically. The highest turnout was in Bashkortostan - more than 69 percent.The Interior Ministry reports that five criminal cases related to the elections in Russia have been opened. The reason was false reports of bombings. No serious violations were detected at the elections on the single day of voting, the agency emphasized. About 30 people were poisoned at polling stations in St. Petersburg. These are PEC members, security guards and police officers. The poisoning was caused by cooked lunches.Observers in different regions reported many violations. For example, in Ryazan Oblast, observers from the CPRF reported the absence of seals on ballot boxes at night. In Krasnodar Krai and Rostov Oblast, they reported ballot box stuffing; in Novosibirsk, Yekaterinburg and Kurgan, they reported vote buying.In Tomsk, Sergei Sechenov, an SVO veteran, was elected to the city council. He ran for the United Russia. Previously, the deputy from this district was Andrei Fateyev, who worked at Navalny's local headquarters.

Title: üñº Z-volunteer, activist for collecting humanitarian aid for the military and advisor...
Description: Z-volunteer Roman Alekhin, an activist for collecting humanitarian aid for the military and adviser to the Kursk Region's governor, has bought a car for 6 million rubles. Before the war, he lived with his mother in a rented apartment - mass mediaRussian pro-war publiki reported that Z-volunteer, an activist in the collection of humanitarian aid for the military and advisor to the governor of Kursk region Roman Alekhin bought himself a car for 6 million rubles, although he himself had previously written about it, It is alleged that Alekhin registered the Zeekr 001 electric car to his company LLC -MRC Ortho-Doctor named after Y.I. Alekhin-. Z-publics also say that before the war in Ukraine and volunteer activities Alekhin lived poorly on a rented apartment with his mother.Alekhin himself did not comment on the information about his purchase.

Title: üñº The Russian army occupied Krasnogorovka and Nevelskoye in Don...
Description: The Russian army has occupied Krasnogorovka and Nevelske in Donetsk RegionThis was reported by the Ukrainian military website Deep State and by Ukrainian Armed Forces officer Mykola Melnyk. Before that, Russian pro-war publiki wrote about the same, and in the summary of the Ministry of Defense of the Russian Federation on September 7, it was stated that the units of -Southern group of troops -continued advancing deep into the enemy's defenses, including in Krasnogorovka. At the same time, Melnyk writes that in Kursk Oblast, the AFU has actually gone on the defensive, holding off attacks by the Russians, who plan to launch a counteroffensive.

Title: üñº The Russian Armed Forces hit the residential sector of the Kharkov region The blow came...
Description: Russian Armed Forces struck the residential sector of the Kharkiv region. The attack targeted Derhachi. As a result, one person died‚Äîa 76-year-old woman‚Äîand another 13 were injured, reported Oleg Synegubov, head of the Kharkiv Regional Military Administration. According to him, the strike from the multiple launch rocket system hit the residential area, causing damage to eight houses.

Title: ‚Ü©Ô∏è A military group is concentrated near the border of Belarus...
Description: ASTRA: Photographs of the transfer of armored units of the Armed Forces of the Republic of Belarus to the Ukrainian border have appeared on pro-Kremlin Telegram channels. The equipment is marked with the letter -B-. It is unknown where and when these photographs were taken. Near the Belarusian border, a military grouping of Ukraine, numbering about 14,000 personnel, has been concentrated, the country's Security Council reported, according to TASS.

Title: üñº The authorities of the Perm region promised to pay women for pregnancy...
Description: The authorities of Perm Krai have promised to pay women for pregnancies of participants in the special military operation in Perm Krai. The authorities of Perm Krai have promised to pay 128,000 rubles each to families of participants in the special military operation who give birth to a child in 2024. This reported in the government of the region.  The right to payment have the spouses of men fighting in Ukraine, if:- the mother permanently resides in Perm Krai on the date of birth of the child- the child was born in a registered marriage- the application is filed during the period of participation of the child's father in the -Special Military Operation- or within 12 months after the service, or within 300 days from the date of death of the child's father, recognition of him as missing or declared dead.Applications are accepted for children born  between January 1, 2024 and December 31, 2024.

Title: üé¨üñºAPU hit a fuel storage site in Belgorod...
Description: The Ukrainian Armed Forces hit a fuel storage site in the Belgorod region. Railway tanks caught fire, the governor of the region, Vyacheslav Gladkov, reported this. According to him, the incident occurred in the Volokonovsky district, according to local residents - in the village of Yutanovka. Information about the victims is being clarified.

Title: üé¨üñº Sochi authorities deny authenticity of video with mine on Admi...
Description: Sochi authorities deny the authenticity of the video with a mine on the beachThe administration of Sochi claims that the video with a sea mine, published on Sunday, September 8 in a number of Russian media and Telegram channels, was filmed elsewhere. On the territory of Sochi such a fact has not been revealed. The location visually does not correspond to the sighting on the Sochi coast, the report says.The Sochi Emergencies Ministry also claims that no one has reported the discovery of the mine to the agency. The regional Ministry of Internal Affairs also denies the authenticity of information about the find.On the distributed video several men pull out on the shore similar to a sea mine object. Later there were versions that it could be a moulage of a sea mine lost during filming by movie makers, or a moulage used by a diving club before the 2014 Olympics.

Title: üñº Russian drone crashes in Latvia for the first time Incident about...
Description: A Russian drone crashed in Latvia for the first timeThe incident occurred on September 7. The drone crashed in the Rezekne region of Latvia, the Ministry of Defense of the Republic reported. Latvian President Edgars Rinkƒìviƒçs confirmed the information about the drone crash, adding that the number of such incidents is growing on the eastern flank of the Alliance. It is specified that the drone flew from the side of Belarus. NATO command was notified of the incident, air defense forces were strengthened. No casualties or damage were reported.

Title: üé¨üñº About half a million people took to the streets in Tel Aviv to protest...
Description: About half a million people took part in a rally in Tel Aviv for the release of Israeli hostagesAccording to the -Forum of Families of Hostages-, about 500 thousand people took part in the rally the day before. This is the largest action in the history of the country, writes The Times of Israel. Police reported that they detained five protesters during the demonstration in Tel Aviv. Another 250 thousand people took part in rallies -in dozens of cities across the country-.

Title: ‚Ü©Ô∏è The number of people killed as a result of the Russian strike on the communications institute in...
Description: ASTRA: The death toll from the missile strike in Poltava has risen to 54 There are 297 injured. Up to 5 more people may remain under the rubble, search operations are ongoing, the State Emergency Service of Ukraine reports. The death toll from the Russian strike on the communications institute in Poltava on September 3 has risen to 58, ‚Äî OVATelegramASTRA Footage from the site of the missile strike on the communications institute in Poltava, where 41 people died and another 180 were injuredA number of Ukrainian channels write that cadets could have been among the dead and wounded. There is no confirmation of this information.

Title: For the inscription No to war on the ballot paper at the elections in St. Petersburg, a...
Description: Observer Marina Popova was detained for writing No to war on her ballot at the St. Petersburg elections. This was reported by OVD-Info, citing the detainee's husband. Popova was taken to police station No. 28, where a report was drawn up on her for petty hooliganism. Also, as the publication -Paper- reports, Marina was charged with discrediting the Russian army.

Title: ‚Ü©Ô∏è 2 people died as a result of the attack on the hotel in Nikolaev...
Description: ASTRA: At night, the Russian Federation shelled a hotel in Nikolaevka, Donetsk region This was reported by the publication -Donbass. Realii- and published footage from the scene. According to the media, according to preliminary information, the Russian army used several KABs, the hotel building was damaged, there may be‚Ä¶ 2 people died as a result of an attack on a hotel in Nikolaevka, Donetsk region, - the State Emergency Service of UkraineTelegramASTRAAt night, the Russian Federation shelled a hotel in Nikolaevka, Donetsk regionThis was reported by the publication -Donbass. Realii- and published footage from the scene. According to the media, according to preliminary information, the Russian army used several KABs, the hotel building was damaged, there may be‚Ä¶

Title: üñº Three Israeli citizens killed in shooting at checkpoint between...
Description: Three Israeli citizens killed in shooting at checkpoint between Jordan and the West Bank According to the Israel Defense Forces, the shooter arrived at the checkpoint in a truck from Jordan and opened fire on border terminal employees. Three Israeli citizens were killed. The shooter was killed by Israeli soldiers. Israeli authorities have classified the incident as a terrorist attack. They are also investigating information that the unknown person's truck may have contained explosives.

Title: üé¨üñº ASTRA publishes the names and stories of soldiers who disappeared under...
Description: ASTRA publishes the names and stories of the soldiers who disappeared under the command of the hero of Russia - Tiger-Ksenofontov. Their relatives contacted the editorial office after the broadcast of the propagandist Solovyov, in which he tried to whitewash Tiger and accused the wife of the deceased of working for the CIPSO - Terekhov Evgeny Pavlovich. According to a fellow soldier, he died on his first combat mission. Of the two hundred people who were sent there, seven survived. All the rest died on the first day of the combat mission. They were in Sinkovka, in the forest belt. Until May 5, the military unit hid the losses and brazenly lied. Later I wrote to another fellow soldier, he said the same thing. That almost everyone was killed. They sent 7 people at a time. They kill them - the next 7 are sent. And so on until everyone is gone. Except for the 300 who managed to be sent to the hospital. As far as I understand, there is no evacuation in Sinkovka. I would very much like to look into the eyes of those commanders who hid the losses for so long. For what ‚Äî for orders? For medals? You can‚Äôt bring people back. I would at least like to understand ‚Äî who will answer for all this? ‚Äî his wife said. Mikhail Ivanovich Gorshkov. He was under the command of Tiger and, as far as I know, also fell under his ‚Äî DRUNK ORDER ‚Äî his relatives reported. Mobilized Pavel Vorobyov [name changed at the request of relatives]. When my husband saw what was happening in Sinkovka, he refused to go. His colleague ‚Äî Orlu ‚Äî reported on the radio that he was a refuser. Orlu‚Äôs order ‚Äî to tie him to a tree in handcuffs and beat him until he agreed. Because he could not stand the pain, he agreed. When they ‚Äî 8 people ‚Äî were entering the base, a drone, Baba Yaga, immediately flew at them, his wife said. Valery Valerievich Golovachev. On the night of March 12, Baba Yaga dropped a shell on his dugout, the dugout collapsed, he and his comrade were seriously injured. His legs were broken. He immediately started calling for help on the radio, shouting that they were both seriously injured. The dugout was covered with earth. He shouted: -Help!-. On March 13, a miner group passed by. They dug him out, gave him first aid, carried him to another dugout, and left him water. The second comrade, Maloy, died from his wounds. All this time he was in that dugout and waiting for the evacuation group. On March 16, he asked for water and medicine, they dropped a package to him from the bird, but because of the wind they said that it flew a little further than the dugout. He started crawling towards the package. But somehow an enemy bird appeared nearby and dropped a shell on him again. My husband never contacted me by radio again. I am still looking for him. I am writing to all the authorities, but the answer is the same: that he is a BP, his wife reported. Denis Gennadievich Zhukov. He died on December 3, 2023. He blew himself up to avoid being captured, having been left with three comrades in a position without ammunition. Daniil Aleksandrovich Tretyakov. He last contacted me on January 21. On February 4, a colleague called and said that my brother had died. On March 22, they called me from the military unit and said that my brother was listed as a BP as of March 22. Ksenofontov was awarded the Hero of Russia. He is alive and well, and my brother is still missing in action, his sister said. Mobilized Kirill Sergeyevich Velichko. He last contacted on January 18, 2024, and said he was being taken to storm the area. According to his fellow soldiers, he died on January 19 near Sinkovka as a result of a drone strike. Andrey Ivanovich Syrotyuk (Orel), when I asked where our soldier was, replied that he had no idea and that he was allegedly in the hospital in January, and then, without continuing the dialogue, blocked me, his wife said. Relatives of the military have repeatedly contacted the Russian Ministry of Defense, the prosecutor's office, and the Investigative Committee demanding that an investigation be conducted into Ksenofontov, but to no avail. Solovyov, you justify him, say that he is a hero of Russia, but you do not want to hear us, ordinary people, wives and mothers, ordinary relatives. He [Ksenofontov] is a terrible person. Why are thousands looking for their relatives, why are there so many missing? - the mother of three children and wife of the deceased serviceman Golovachev answered the propagandist.

Title: ‚Ü©Ô∏èüé¨üñº -I want to address Solovyov. To say, here I am. I am not a fairy...
Description: ASTRA: ASTRA journalists should be jailed, said Solovyov. This is how the propagandist responded to the publication about the commander of the 25th brigade, who got drunk and sent dozens of soldiers on a deadly assault Vladimir Solovyov responded to the ASTRA publication about Colonel Alexey... - I want to address Solovyov. To say, here I am. I am not a fake, I am a citizen of the Russian Federation, I am proud of my homeland and I am not some kind of CIPSO. Everything that I told -Astra-, I wrote in an appeal to Commander-in-Chief Putin, and this is the truth. I am not going to retract a single word I said - Relatives of those missing and killed under the leadership of the hero of Russia Colonel Ksenofontov responded to the propagandist Solovyov. Relatives of the dead and missing soldiers from the 25th brigade contacted the ASTRA editorial board after the publication about how Colonel Alexey Ksenofontov, call sign -Tiger-, while intoxicated, sent dozens of men on a deadly assault. Let us recall that Vladimir Solovyov responded to the post, stating that this was a lie, and that the Ukrainian CIPSO, through -Astra-, was allegedly throwing in fake materials with the aim of -distracting our brilliant commanders from the work of destroying the Nazi vermin-. Therefore, he claims, the journalists of the publication should be put in prison, and an explanation should be taken from -the citizen [Bolvinova, the wife of the dead soldier, - ed.], who told all this-. -Citizen Solovyov, interview all of us. Look how many women curse your Ksenofontov. Talk to the women who wish death to -Tiger- under your broadcasts. Why are you trying to whitewash this man? Why don't you tell us that Ksenofontov has a criminal record for abuse of office? - Alina Bolvinova, who told -Astra- about that very drunken assault, asked the propagandist. According to relatives who contacted the editorial office, Alexey Ksenofontov -Tiger- and Andrey Syrotyuk -Orel-, by sending soldiers into deadly assaults and receiving state awards for it, understate the losses of their -death brigade- (that's the name the 25th brigade received among relatives) by tens of times thanks to the so-called -seconded- soldiers - from other military units. ASTRA knows the names of at least two soldiers who came under their command from an illegal basement in Zaitsevo (-LNR-) - these are Stefan Viktorovich Glazer and Vladimir Viktorovich Volodin. Both disappeared after they were sent from the basement to the assault squad. According to Glazer's mother, -Orel- went to Zaitsevo for -reinforcements- every week. - A huge number of those assigned thus disappeared in the 25th Brigade - virtually without names - because their movements were not reflected in the combat logs... In this way, the 25th Brigade managed to significantly reduce irrecoverable losses... So many assigned men died under the leadership of -Tiger-, and at the time of their death - unknown guys... Let Ksenofontov answer me: where is my son!!! Whom I have been looking for for 8 months!!! Where is my child? What did he and Orel do with him? - The husband of another ASTRA interlocutor also disappeared after he was assigned to military unit 29760 under the leadership of -Orel- after being in Zaitsevo and sent on a combat mission at the end of January. - I really want someone to answer for my husband-, - says his wife. The wife of Denis Valerievich Chernyshov is part of a group of wives and mothers of 43 other missing persons under the leadership of Ksenofontov. - All our soldiers contacted each other for the last time on February 24. And no one can tell us where they are. There are also no payroll accruals. <‚Ä¶> In this unit, they don‚Äôt even know what an assault kilometer is. Because the guys don‚Äôt pass this assault kilometer, they can‚Äôt even walk 100 meters. They die leaving the dugout. And when someone says that the command there is great, then go beyond the tape, at least a kilometer, and talk to the guys who are cold, hungry, sitting without water, food and clothes. They are told that you either go forward or back. And there is no way back, because they are immediately zeroed out. Because they are inconvenient for them-, - says Chernyshov‚Äôs wife. The women wrote a collective appeal to Bastrykin (in the photo). ASTRA has previously written about what is happening in the 25th Brigade, where soldiers are disappearing in droves at the front, and the command is sending people without eyes, on crutches and with hepatitis into battle. Video is too big

Title: üé¨üñº At night, the Russian Federation shelled a hotel in Nikolaevka, Donetsk region ...
Description: At night, the Russian Federation shelled a hotel in Nikolaevka, Donetsk region. This was reported by the publication -Donbass. Realii- and published footage from the scene. According to the media, according to preliminary information, the Russian army used several KABs, the hotel building was damaged, two people may be under the rubble. The OVA and the local prosecutor's office have not yet reported on the consequences of this shelling. According to the Donetsk OVA, in just the past 24 hours, the Russian army killed 5 residents of Donbas: 3 in Konstantinovka, 1 each in Petrovka and Shcherbinovka. Another 11 people in the region were injured in 24 hours.

Title: ‚Ü©Ô∏è Military court sentences former military...
Description: ASTRA: A military court sentenced former serviceman Sergei Borodin, who is one of the defendants in the case of theft of land from the Russian Defense Ministry worth more than 940 million rubles, to 3 years and 5 months in prison, ‚Äî TASSTelegramASTRAAnother person who allegedly conspired with Deputy Defense Minister Timur Ivanov, Sergei Borodin, has been arrested for 2 months ‚Äî A ruling by the Basmanny District Court of Moscow granted the motion of the preliminary investigation bodies‚Ä¶

Title: ‚Ü©Ô∏èüé¨ -Quadric, drive the fuck back! What the hell are you doing a...
Description: ASTRA: Russian soldiers robbed another store in the Kursk region In August, Russian soldiers robbed the Kapitosha children's clothing store in Kornevo (less than 20 km from the border). The corresponding video from the store's surveillance cameras was published by blogger Michael Naki. Into the lens... -Quadric, drive the fuck back! What the hell are you doing anyway? We, bitch, have been helping you from the first fucking days. What the fuck are you doing, huh? Aren‚Äôt you fucking ashamed, bitch?-,- in the Russian border, local residents caught the military who were robbing their houseIn the video, a woman accuses the military of they stole an ATV and took the residents' personal belongings, including stew, out of the house. The channel that published the video is -Ashes- writes that the place and time of the video is unknown. Journalists assume that it was filmed in the Belgorod region - since on one of the cars in the video you can see the corresponding license plate with region 31. Against the backdrop of the Ukrainian Armed Forces' offensive on the Kursk region, several videos appeared on the Internet in which Russian military rob locals communication shops and shops. A resident of the border region, in a conversation with ASTRA, complained that in Kursk Kornevo-according to rumorsthe military opened up almost all the retail outlets.-. Video is too big

Title: ‚Ü©Ô∏èüñº The photo shows the five-star Petra Segreta Resort & Spa hot...
Description: ASTRA: Soloviev and Potupchik helped Nastya Ivleeva apologize for the -naked party.- The project for Ivleeva‚Äôs return to public space was agreed upon with the Kremlin, and one of the political consultants working on the -penitential image- was propagandist Vladimir Solovyov... The photo shows the five-star hotel Petra Segreta Resort & Spa in Italian Sardinia. It was there that Russian propagandist and one of the Kremlin‚Äôs main contractors for fakes on Telegram, Kristina Potupchik, was vacationing yesterdayA year ago, Potupchik said that she was not -given a single visa- and that she would I still didn‚Äôt go to the European Union.Potupchik herself published photos from her vacation in a luxury hotel on her Instagram. She did not indicate a geolocation - but a vacation spot it was accidentally revealed by fellow travelers on their social networks. Potupchik was a former commissar of the patriotic movement -Nashi-. Now she is promoting content beneficial to the authorities on social networks - for example, in February of this year, a channel from her network published a fake appeal from the mother of Alexei Navalny, which was then picked up by propagandists.

Title: üñº Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces of Ukraine Syrsky said ...
Description: Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces of Ukraine Syrsky said in an interview with CNN that over the past 6 days the Russian army -has not advanced a single meter- in the Pokrovsky direction. According to him, all because the Ukrainian Armed Forces successfully managed to distract Russian troops with an offensive in the Kursk region. In mid-August, due to the approaching front line from Pokrovsk, Donetsk region, the Ukrainian authorities announced an evacuation..

Title: ‚Ü©Ô∏èüñº -Thank you for your love and memes-, - Durov for the first t...
Description: ASTRA: Durov was charged with: complicity in facilitating illegal transactions, complicity in storing pornographic materials, including with minors, complicity in drug trafficking, complicity in fraud; as well as in providing... -Thank you for your love and memes,- Durov first commented on his criminal prosecution in FranceHere are the main points from the post, which the founder Telegram published in its channel:‚Äî The charges brought against Durov came as a surprise to him, since the messenger has an official representative in the EU who responds to requests from European security forces;‚Äî Durov, how a citizen of France, often visited the consulate of this country in the UAE - therefore, the French security forces had many ways to contact him and request assistance. -I personally helped them set up a telegram hotline on terrorism issues,- says Durov. ‚Äî Telegram has an official email for requests from European security forces, which, according to Durov, anyone can find using the request -Telegram EU address for law enforcement- in the Google search engine;‚Äî Durov believes that -the laws of the era before smartphones- were used against him - he called the very practice of blaming the head of the platform for the crimes of its users erroneous;‚Äî Durov also recalled that Telegram refused to hand over the -keys- to encrypting the platform to Russia and to ban channels of protesters in Iran, for which the messenger was banned in this country. -We are ready to leave markets that do not agree with our principles, because we are not doing this for the sake of money,- Durov said.Previously it has become knownthat Durov is accused of complicity in illegal money transfers, distribution of porn, including children's, drugs, as well as refusal to provide information to European security forces upon their requests. Court banned Durov from leaving France for six months - and released him on bail of 5 million euros.

Title: üñº The colonel got drunk and sent dozens of mobilized and contrac...
Description: The colonel got drunk and sent dozens of mobilized and contract soldiers into a deadly assault. A month later he was given a hero of RussiaMikhail Shchebetun signed a contract with the Russian Defense Ministry on January 31, 2024. Until February 11, the man was in a training unit in Kursk, and then ended up in military unit 29760, 25th brigade under the command of Alexei Ksenofontov (pictured), aka -Tiger,- his wife Alina Bolvinova told ASTRA. -The last time my husband called me was on February 14, 2024... he told me in plain text that this was most likely the last conversation we would have with him, since they had already been warned that as soon as they arrive at the site [near Avdiivka], their phones will be taken away. The commander made it clear to them that they were being taken to their death,- she claims. After this conversation, Alina knew nothing about the fate of her husband for a month and a half. The woman independently began to look for colleagues and their relatives, and in April she learned from several that he had died during the assault on March 9. Only after this he was added to the list of missing persons. Later, the acting unit commander confirmed to Alina at a personal reception that Mikhail had indeed not returned from the combat mission on March 9. According to colleagues, that day the commander of the 25th brigade, Colonel Alexey Ksenofontov, call sign -Tiger,- got drunk, and being -in a bad mood,- he sent mobilized and contract soldiers on a deadly assault, and then, according to Alina, -watched and enjoyed how the Armed Forces of Ukraine crushed our fighters alive with tanks and threw in the Baba Yaga UAV.- Mikhail was among the dead.Alina, despite confirmation of her death, is still not can obtain a certificate of the death of her husband. -How long will Alexey, the brigade commander of Ksenofontov, mock the soldiers, subject them to torture and purposefully send them to death? And do you think our army really deserves such commanders as? -Eagle- [Syrotyuk Andrey Ivanovich], who, according to information that regularly pops up on the Internet, allows himself to cancel our fighters who refuse to carry out their criminal orders with the Tiger, or such a commander as the current VRiO military unit 29760 Averin D.S. unable to make strong-willed decisions and take responsibility‚Ä¶?-,says Alina‚Äôs address to Putin. In April of this year, propagandist Vladimir Solovyov made a story with Ksenofontov, from which it became known that the colonel had already received the Hero of Russia. In comments under the story on VKontakte - dozens of messages from relatives of the dead and missing soldiers who were subordinate to the Tiger. Women ask where their relatives are, for what reason the bodies were not evacuated, why their husbands were sent on deadly assaults, why the military -lay down like flies,- and also wish the -Tiger- to -die a painful death in civilian life.-

Title: ‚Ü©Ô∏èüé¨ More video of shooting at drones in Tver There are no offici...
Description: ASTRA: Drones attacked Tver, presumably a military airfield was under attack. Local publics report a UAV attack in the Migalovo area. More video of shooting at drones in TverNo official comments yet.

Title: ‚Ü©Ô∏èüñº In Sumy, 13 people were injured as a result of the attack - ...
Description: ASTRA: Video In Sumy, 13 people were injured as a result of the attack - city authorities Of them two children: a 7-year-old boy and a 13-year-old girl.
